title: go.tools/importer: no way of specifying alternative binary importer
body:
llgo is being refactored to use go.tools/ssa and go.tools/importer. llgo has a custom
importer which is required for typechecking. Importer currently just uses types.GcImport
under the covers, and has no way of providing a custom importer.

My suggestion would be to take a copy of TypeChecker.Import, and use that in
importBinary if it's non-nil.
